actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Smith, of NH without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 48.
Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 121 West Spring Street in New Albany, Indiana, as the "Lee H. Hamilton Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building and U.S. courthouse located at 121 West Spring Street in New Albany, Indiana, as the Lee H. Hamilton Federal Building and United States Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 121 West Spring Street in New Albany, Indiana, as the "Lee H. Hamilton Federal Building and United States Courthouse".
